item.description:
I have recently trained in Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) and am amazed at the power and effectiveness of this relatively simple tool for releasing trapped emotional pain. When used properly EFT is able to release us of many of our negative emotional responses that hold us back in our lives and because many physical issues are emotionally related EFT has the ability to help people with health issues as well. EFT has been helpful for many people dealing with anxiety, fears, depression, phobias, asthma, allergies, and much more.

Sound too good to be true. I thought so at first but the more I use it for myself the better I find myself feeling and I've witnessed others first hand who have gotten great results.

If you'd like to learn more attend my mini EFT workshop on Thursday, June 24th at 7:00 PM. In this hour plus workshop I will educate you about EFT and teach you how to do it for yourself. Once you've taken this workshop you'll have all the information you need to use this powerful technique for yourself and immediately begin reaping its rewards.
item.name: Discover the Magic of Emotional Freedom Technique
